result.arabic_text: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ
result.translation: (27) Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.[1583]
result.footnotes: [1583]- This and the following verse are an address to Ṣāliḥ (upon him be peace).
